short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better-Moodle is a Chrome extension designed to enhance the ESIEA ENT platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better-Moodle is a Chrome extension designed to enhance the ESIEA ENT platform. It adds features like a quiz timer, course pinning, and improved quiz review by removing unnecessary information and adding helpful details such as estimated time. It also supports custom scripts for advanced math functionalities like Gaussian elimination, matrix inversion, and determinants.
